metadata.title: CVE-2024-10467 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 131, Firefox ESR 128.3, andThunderbird 128.3. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruptionand we presume that with enough effort some of these could have beenexploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 132,Firefox ESR < 128.4, Thunderbird < 128.4, and Thunderbird < 132.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
